alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Dorado; Guaynabo; Loiza; San Juan; Toa Alta; Toa Baja; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 10 at 5:36AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Bayamon, Carolina, Catano, Dorado, Guaynabo, Loiza, San Juan, Toa Alta, Toa Baja and Trujillo Alto. * WHEN...Until 745 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 536 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Guaynabo, Bayamon, Catano, Sabana Seca, Trujillo Alto, Carolina, Toa Alta, Toa Baja, Dorado, Corozal, Vega Alta, Levittown, Candelaria, Pajaros, Candelaria Arenas, Ingenio, Campanilla, San Jose and Galateo. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Dorado; Guaynabo; Loiza; San Juan; Toa Alta; Toa Baja; Trujillo Alto
